duties_responsibilities.duty: Design and develop an enterprise-level platform following microservice architecture and deploying to Azure-based cloud infrastructure.
Implement the Order Placement system by designing and implementing new core services.
Participate in the discovery/design phase to analyze and document existing services, data dependencies, and integration layer in order to define implementation roadmap.
Reverse engineer business rules, functional requirements, and data for the legacy implementation.
Estimate implementation complexity and implement the solution.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field (Master's preferred)
